name: MagicSwaper
description:
Soon on this channel there will be a video about jam and this project))

Prehistory:

In this game you will play the role of a novice magician who wandered into a clearing in the middle of the forest. Monsters surrounded him. And he knows only 4 spells and then only for 5 seconds. He will do his best.

Gameplay:

You have 4 spells that will act for 5 seconds and re-cast randomly.

What are the spells:

1) FireBall

2) IceBall

3) Teleport

4) BreakTime

Live as much as possible))) Good luck))))

The game was made on a gamejam in 15 hours -_-
